location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, Currently at Tehran, to William Newnham, Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter acknowledges the Board's decision to abolish the office of Marine Agent in the Persian Gulf, and accepts the order that the Marine Agent's duties will now be carried out by the Resident at Bushire.
